p: (Table 1). At each visit, the oncologist will conduct a history and physical examination, and assess CTC-AE toxicities, pain and quality of life. CT head, chest, abdomen and pelvis will be repeated at 6 months, then every year for 3 years. PET-CT and SPECT-CT will be repeated at 1 year. Additional Imaging should be carried out at the discretion of the physician. Additional treatment (e.g. further chemotherapy) is at the discretion of the oncologists.
